name: The Ghoulstore
description:
what is the ghoulstore...? i'm glad you asked...

it's an experience featuring noises, musics, images, foods, the whole deal...

guide your playable "scorpens" (yes, that one, the true babyhead) through the ghoulstotore, a place where items and foods are stored and contained, living or not living... these items may just leave you a bit scared out...

but that does not stop our "scorpens" from getting his item at the end, a special halloween decoration just for him, you gotta help him out there!

Initial controls:

Arrow to move.

"Z" to turn light on/off (can't see scary stuff if you can't see!)

"X" to run fast.

to all babyheads! have fun!

made by @lok__os
